page.title: 01 THE NUTFIELD LINK.
page.content: The{Nutfield Link}was started in January{1974.}At first in Nutfield there was only a Church Magazine.Mr. Wakeling, the vicar in{1973,}thought about having a new{community magazine. There was a meeting and it was decided that{Miss Chandler}would be the Editor and she has been so for{11 years. Each month the magazine has a different picture on the cover,which is sometimes a place in Nutfield,a flower or an animal.{ { 700 copies }are made each month.In the{Link}it mainly tells what is going on and what has happened in Nutfield. It is called a{community magazine} because it is made by people in the village. The first{Link}ever published was{5p}and now it is{10p.}The price will probably go up next year because of the price of paper.
